verses.verse: Now when these things were <S%H3615>done,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H5066>drew<s%> near to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, "The <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> have not <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> following their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> even those of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonites,<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabites,<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

For they have <S%H5375>taken<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for themselves and for their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> so that the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> have <S%H6148>mixed<s%> themselves with the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands.<s%> <S%H3027>Yes,<s%> the hand of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%> has been <S%H7223>chief<s%> in this <S%H4604>trespass.<s%>"

When I <S%H8085>heard<s%> this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> I <S%H7167>tore<s%> my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H899>robe,<s%> and plucked <S%H4803>off<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> and of my <S%H2206>beard,<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H8074>confounded.<s%>

Then were <S%H622>assembled<s%> to me everyone who <S%H2730>trembled<s%> at the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because of their <S%H4604>trespass<s%> of the <S%H1473>captivity;<s%> and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8074>confounded<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

At the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%> I arose <S%H6965>up<s%> from my <S%H8589>humiliation,<s%> even with my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H899>robe<s%> <S%H7167>torn;<s%> and I <S%H3766>fell<s%> on my <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>out<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God;<s%>

and I <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H430>God,<s%> I am <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>blush<s%> to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H430>you,<s%> my God; for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> our <S%H7218>head,<s%> and our <S%H819>guiltiness<s%> has grown <S%H1431>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>

Since the <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> we have been <S%H1419>exceeding<s%> <S%H819>guilty<s%> to this <S%H3117>day;<s%> and for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H4428>we,<s%> our kings, and our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> have been <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> to <S%H961>plunder,<s%> and to <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>face,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Now for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%> <S%H8467>grace<s%> has been shown from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H7604>leave<s%> us a remnant to <S%H6413>escape,<s%> and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H3489>nail<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> that our <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H215>lighten<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4241>reviving<s%> in our <S%H5659>bondage.<s%>

For we are <S%H5650>bondservants;<s%> yet our <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> us in our <S%H5659>bondage,<s%> but has <S%H5186>extended<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to us in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4241>reviving,<s%> to set <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H5975>repair<s%> its <S%H2723>ruins,<s%> and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H1447>wall<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%H430>"Now,<s%> our God, what shall we <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5800>this?<s%> For we have forsaken your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

which you have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H776><s%> 'The land, to which you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5079>it,<s%> is an unclean <S%H776>land<s%> through the <S%H5079>uncleanness<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> through their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> which have <S%H4390>filled<s%> it from one <S%H6310>end<s%> to <S%H6310>another<s%> with their <S%H2932>filthiness.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H5414>don't<s%> give your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> neither <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> nor <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> or their <S%H2896%H99999>prosperity<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> that you may be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and leave it for an <S%H3423>inheritance<s%> to your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>'

<S%H310>"After<s%> all that has <S%H935>come<s%> on us for our <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>deeds,<s%> and for our <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H819>guilt,<s%> since <S%H430>you,<s%> our God, have <S%H2820>punished<s%> us <S%H4295>less<s%> than our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H5414>deserve,<s%> and have given us such a <S%H6413>remnant,<s%>

shall we <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and join in <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that do these <S%H8441>abominations?<s%> <S%H599>Wouldn't<s%> you be angry with us until you had <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H7611>us,<s%> so that there should be no remnant, nor any to <S%H6413>escape?<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you are <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> for we are left a <S%H7604>remnant<s%> that has <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H6440>Behold,<s%> we are before you in our <S%H819>guiltiness;<s%> for none can <S%H5975>stand<s%> before you because of <S%H6440>this.<s%>"
